mapper.select: SELECT id, doc_id, kb_id, content, 1 - (embedding <=> CAST(#{targetVector, jdbcType=OTHER, typeHandler=com.example.knowledgeservice.handler.PGvectorTypeHandler} AS vector)) AS distance FROM document_chunks WHERE kb_id = #{kbId} ORDER BY embedding <=> CAST(#{targetVector, jdbcType=OTHER, typeHandler=com.example.knowledgeservice.handler.PGvectorTypeHandler} AS vector) LIMIT #{topK}
